00062 class PLT_DeviceIcon
00063 {
00064 public:
00065     PLT_DeviceIcon(const char* mimetype = "", 
00066                    NPT_Int32   width = 0, 
00067                    NPT_Int32   height = 0,
00068                    NPT_Int32   depth = 0,
00069                    const char* urlpath = "") :
00070         m_MimeType(mimetype),
00071         m_Width(width),
00072         m_Height(height),
00073         m_Depth(depth),
00074         m_UrlPath(urlpath) {}
00075     virtual ~PLT_DeviceIcon() {}
00076

00078     NPT_Int32   m_Width;
00079     NPT_Int32   m_Height;
00080     NPT_Int32   m_Depth;
00081     NPT_String  m_UrlPath;
00082 };

00092 class PLT_DeviceData
00093 {
00094 public:
00095     PLT_DeviceData(
00096         NPT_HttpUrl      description_url = NPT_HttpUrl(NULL, 0, "/"), 
00097         const char*      uuid = "",
00098         NPT_TimeInterval lease_time = PLT_Constants::GetInstance().m_DefaultDeviceLease,
00099         const char*      device_type = "",
00100         const char*      friendly_name = "");
00101 
00102     /* methods */
00103     virtual NPT_Result  GetDescription(NPT_String& desc);
00104     virtual NPT_String  GetDescriptionUrl(const char* bind_addr = NULL);
00105     virtual NPT_HttpUrl GetURLBase();
00106     virtual NPT_HttpUrl NormalizeURL(const NPT_String& url);
00107     virtual NPT_Result  GetDescription(NPT_XmlElementNode* parent, NPT_XmlElementNode** device = NULL);
00108     virtual NPT_String  GetIconUrl(const char* mimetype = NULL, NPT_Int32 maxsize = 0, NPT_Int32 maxdepth = 0);
00109 
00110     const NPT_TimeInterval& GetLeaseTime()    const { return m_LeaseTime;        }
00111     const NPT_String&   GetUUID()             const { return m_UUID;             }
00112     const NPT_String&   GetFriendlyName()     const { return m_FriendlyName;     }
00113     const NPT_String&   GetType()             const { return m_DeviceType;       }
00114     const NPT_String&   GetModelDescription() const { return m_ModelDescription; }
00115     const NPT_String&   GetParentUUID()       const { return m_ParentUUID;       }
00116     bool                IsRoot()              { return m_ParentUUID.IsEmpty(); }
00117 
00118     const NPT_Array<PLT_Service*>&            GetServices()        const { return m_Services; }
00119     const NPT_Array<PLT_DeviceDataReference>& GetEmbeddedDevices() const { return m_EmbeddedDevices; }
00120 
00121     NPT_Result FindEmbeddedDevice(const char* uuid, PLT_DeviceDataReference& device);
00122     NPT_Result FindEmbeddedDeviceByType(const char* type, PLT_DeviceDataReference& device);
00123     NPT_Result FindServiceById(const char* id, PLT_Service*& service);
00124     NPT_Result FindServiceByType(const char* type, PLT_Service*& service);
00125     NPT_Result FindServiceBySCPDURL(const char* url, PLT_Service*& service);
00126     NPT_Result FindServiceByControlURL(const char* url, PLT_Service*& service, bool recursive = false);
00127     NPT_Result FindServiceByEventSubURL(const char* url, PLT_Service*& service, bool recursive = false);
00128 
00129     /* called by PLT_Device subclasses */
00130     NPT_Result AddEmbeddedDevice(PLT_DeviceDataReference& device);
00131     NPT_Result RemoveEmbeddedDevice(PLT_DeviceDataReference& device);
00132     NPT_Result AddService(PLT_Service* service);
00133 
00134     operator const char* ();
00135 
00136 protected:
00137     virtual ~PLT_DeviceData();
00138     virtual void       Cleanup();
00139     virtual NPT_Result OnAddExtraInfo(NPT_XmlElementNode* /*device_node*/) { return NPT_SUCCESS; }
00140 
00141 private:
00142     /* called by PLT_CtrlPoint when new device is discovered */
00143     NPT_Result    SetURLBase(NPT_HttpUrl& url_base);
00144     NPT_TimeStamp GetLeaseTimeLastUpdate();
00145     NPT_Result    SetLeaseTime(NPT_TimeInterval lease_time);
00146     NPT_Result    SetDescription(const char*                   szDescription, 
00147                                  const NPT_HttpRequestContext& context);
00148     NPT_Result    SetDescriptionDevice(NPT_XmlElementNode* device_node);
00149 
00150 public:
00151     NPT_String m_Manufacturer;
00152     NPT_String m_ManufacturerURL;
00153     NPT_String m_ModelDescription;
00154     NPT_String m_ModelName;
00155     NPT_String m_ModelNumber;
00156     NPT_String m_ModelURL;
00157     NPT_String m_SerialNumber;
00158     NPT_String m_UPC;
00159     NPT_String m_PresentationURL;
00160     NPT_String m_DlnaDoc;
00161     NPT_String m_DlnaCap;
00162     NPT_String m_AggregationFlags;
00163 
00164 protected:
00165     friend class NPT_Reference<PLT_DeviceData>;
00166     friend class PLT_CtrlPoint;
00167     friend class PLT_DeviceReadyIterator;
00168     friend class PLT_DeviceHost;
00169 
00170     //members
00171     NPT_String                         m_ParentUUID;
00172     NPT_String                         m_UUID;
00173     NPT_HttpUrl                        m_URLDescription;
00174     NPT_HttpUrl                        m_URLBase;
00175     NPT_String                         m_DeviceType;
00176     NPT_String                         m_FriendlyName;
00177     NPT_TimeInterval                   m_LeaseTime;
00178     NPT_TimeStamp                      m_LeaseTimeLastUpdate;
00179     NPT_Array<PLT_Service*>            m_Services;
00180     NPT_Array<PLT_DeviceDataReference> m_EmbeddedDevices;

00182 
00183     /* IP address of interface used when retrieving device description.
00184        We need the info for the control point subscription callback */
00185     NPT_IpAddress                      m_LocalIfaceIp; 
00186     NPT_String                         m_Representation;
00187 };

00189 /*----------------------------------------------------------------------
00190 |   PLT_DeviceDataFinder
00191 +---------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00196 class PLT_DeviceDataFinder
00197 {
00198 public:
00199     // methods
00200     PLT_DeviceDataFinder(const char* uuid) : m_UUID(uuid) {}
00201     virtual ~PLT_DeviceDataFinder() {}
00202 
00203     bool operator()(const PLT_DeviceDataReference& data) const {
00204         return data->GetUUID().Compare(m_UUID, true) ? false : true;
00205     }
00206 
00207 private:
00208     // members
00209     NPT_String m_UUID;
00210 };
00211 
00212 /*----------------------------------------------------------------------
00213 |   PLT_DeviceDataFinderByType
00214 +---------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00219 class PLT_DeviceDataFinderByType
00220 {
00221 public:
00222     // methods
00223     PLT_DeviceDataFinderByType(const char* type) : m_Type(type) {}
00224     virtual ~PLT_DeviceDataFinderByType() {}
00225 
00226     bool operator()(const PLT_DeviceDataReference& data) const {
00227         return data->GetType().Compare(m_Type, true) ? false : true;
00228     }
00229 
00230 private:
00231     // members
00232     NPT_String m_Type;
00233 };
